<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thundering](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2850)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=697" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 239 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _thundering_ weapon lets out a peal of thunder when it hits, dealing an extra 1d6 sonic damage on a successful Strike. On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a DC 24 Fortitude save or be deafened for 1 minute (or 1 hour on a critical failure).   

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The save DC is 34, and the deafness is permanent. Sonic damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target's sonic resistance.
